_header: Jesu for Thee mourn I may
Subjects: Christ, love toward; love, toward Jesus
_description: A Song of Love to Jesus — two 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

TCD155.First Lines:
Ihesu for þe mourne I mayAs tercel þat longeþ
                    boþe nyȝt & day…
TCD155.Last Lines:
…And holy soules þat þou bouȝtes dereIn to holy
                    places
TCD155.Note: Third (?) Cantus in Rolle’s Ego dormio (p. 1).
